title: Hot Mustard Recipe
full_text:
Hot Mustard Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Resting Time
15 mins
Total
20 mins
Serves
2
to 3 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
tablespoons
hot
mustard powder
, such as Colman’s
3
tablespoons
cold
water
Directions
In a small bowl, whisk together mustard powder and water until completely combined. Let rest for 15 minutes; use immediately.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
